meanings.definition: A sound made by a mobile phone to signal an incoming call.
meanings.sent1: My new ringtone is a catchy tune.
meanings.sent2: I changed my ringtone to a song from my favorite band.
meanings.sent3: The ringtone of a barking dog always surprises me.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a joyful ringtone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The ringtone of chirping birds brings a sense of nature to my phone.

meanings.definition: A customizable sound used to alert the user of an incoming call or message.
meanings.sent1: I set my ringtone to a calming ocean wave.
meanings.sent2: Her ringtone is a funny snippet from a comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The ringtone of a meowing cat never fails to make me smile.
meanings.sent4: His voice was like a soothing ringtone in the chaos of the city.
meanings.sent5: The ringtone of a ticking clock adds a sense of urgency to the call.
